column4: When I install do I have to do anything for an ati gpu? The hardware drivers section shows nothing.
01:05.0 VGA compatible controller: ATI Technologies Inc RS780MC [Radeon HD 3100 Graphics]
ok then your card should work with ATI proprietary driver, did you try install from synaptic
you know the name of that package
just type fglrx in synaptic it should show something
it made a new kernel, lemme reboot
looks like it made an xorg.conf :)
